name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Nodspot.com - Find & Play Artist's Top Tracks

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find and play top tracks of an artist or a band in seconds.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Highlight a piece of text representing an artist or a band and play their top tracks in a second.

Let's look at a real life example of how Nodspot extension can make your life easier. 

1. Say, you're browsing a social media website.
2. You stumble upon a friend's post boasting this great track by "Queen". It's possibly followed up by a youtube video.
3. You then think: "Mmm.. Queeeeen. I actually feel like listening to their top tracks.".
4. Nodspot plugin comes into play - you highlight the text "Queen".
5. Right click it.
6. Select "Play Queen top tracks".
7. Enjoy.

Also, do not forget to visit www.nodspot.com - it's like a love child between Spotify and Youtube - loads of music for free.
